item.title: Engaging Insights on Video Digital Marketing: A Talk at HKPOLYU SPEED in Dec 2019
item.description: In December 2019, I had the opportunity to deliver a 60-minute talk at HKPOLYU SPEED, focusing on the impact of vidoe marketing in digital marketing. The audience comprised part-time diploma students enrolled in digital marketing modules, totaling up to 50 participants.
